nadu thinduwa prakashayata path kala pasu samagam deka wisinma niwedana nikuth karana lada athara apal samagama thama niwedanaya thula "mema naduwa petant balapathra ho mudal ikmawagiya watinakam pilibanda naduwak bawath apal samagama thama anyathawaya saha nawyakaranaya gunanga randawagath me polawa matha hondama upakarana nipadawimata kapa wena bawath dakwayi,apal samagama nishpadana paribhogikayage thrupthiya sandaha bawath thama tharangakaruwanta anukaraka nipadawima sandaha nowana bawath wadi durata sandahanwa thibuni.thawada samusan samagama warada piligena niwaradi paniwidayak laba denu athayi apal samagama apeksha karan bawanda sadahanwa thibuni."
